summary: A 1920s mail pilot and a rich man's daughter crash-land on a mountain full of hungry wolves.
cast: Christopher Reeve|Rosanna Arquette|Jack Warden|Sam Wanamaker|Scott Wilson|Tyne Daly|Marcia Strassman|Will Hare|Robert Pierce|Glenn Neufeld|Frano Lasic|Ron Travis|Jeff Harding|Paul Reid Roman|Paul Lichtman|Timothy Stack|Larry B. Williams
title: El aviador
